commit message: switch to use lbprod for test, unittest, debug and install_debug make targets

* Default the leadervboard menu item to be disabled
* reworked the menuitem updates to use onPrepareOptionsMenu and menu
invalidation to force a refresh.
don't disable FxA ability just because the user logged out
force the nickname field to be enabled when we write a value into it
fixed leaderboard breakage in test robolectric tests
